document.heading: Driver Privacy Protection Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-207, the “Driver Privacy Protection Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-671. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 2012, and Oct. 2, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 23, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-487 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-207 became effective on Mar. 5, 2013.
